XXekmuhr_u:1: ñ1.1 evaṃ mayā śru[tam eka{smin}?] samaye bhagavāṃ cchrāvastyāṃ viharati
XXekmuhr_u:4: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo
XXekmuhr_u:7: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ
XXekmuhr_u:8: pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā\var{kṛtvā\lem \cod; kṛtya \Dutt} kānte nyasīda bhagavantam etad avocat

XXekmuhr_u:15: parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe\var{viṣa[dūṣa]ṇe \em \Hidas; viṣa[prahā]ṇe \em\Dutt} kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame na praśame, nedaṃ [sthā]na<ṃ> vidyate; sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na

XXekmuhr_u:39: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
